tasks.label: Build debug version

args: source /etc/profile && export PATH=/mingw32/bin:$PATH && cd '${workspaceFolder}' && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -B build -G"MSYS Makefiles" && make -C ./build

tasks.detail: Builds the debug version of the draw app

tasks.label: Build release version

args: source /etc/profile && export PATH=/mingw32/bin:$PATH && cd '${workspaceFolder}' && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -B build -G"MSYS Makefiles" && make -C ./build

tasks.detail: Builds the release version of the draw app
